relation.text: 1781 My Dearest Miſs Hamilton I have been so Ill since I sent
Mornings in Bed , & then during the night , I had just the sort of Cough , ( wh : I do believe
will hinder my doing , next Thursday
mean y e the 25 th ) to her Majesty ) I yesterday
tomorrow : nothing can be more grateful than Lord Dartrey & I are for this , & every Mark , of the Queen 's
